mapper.select: select cateLevel, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from goods_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_items (itemNum, itemName, cateCode, itemPrice, itemCount, itemDes, itemImg, itemThumbImg) values (tbl_item_seq.nextval, #{itemName}, #{cateCode}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemCount}, #{itemDes}, #{itemImg}, #{itemThumbImg})
mapper.select: select itemNum, itemName, cateCode, itemPrice, itemCount, itemDes, itemImg, itemDate from tbl_items order by itemNum desc

select i.itemNum, i.itemName, i.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, itemPrice, itemCount, itemDes, itemImg, itemDate, itemThumbImg from tbl_items i inner join goods_category c on i.cateCode = c.cateCode where i.itemNum = #{itemNum}
mapper.update: update tbl_Items set itemName = #{itemName}, cateCode = #{cateCode}, itemPrice = #{itemPrice}, itemCount = #{itemCount}, itemDes = #{itemDes}, itemImg = #{itemImg}, itemThumbImg = #{itemThumbImg} where itemNum = #{itemNum}
mapper.select: select tbl_member.userId, tbl_member.verify, orders.delivery from tbl_member left join orders on tbl_member.userId=orders.userId where orders.delivery is not null
select tbl_items.itemName, order_detail.result from order_detail left join tbl_items on tbl_items.itemNum=order_detail.itemNum where order_detail.result is not null
